Class Radar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Radar

  • public class Radar
extends java.lang.Object
    The model for radar scan and accumulator
    Version:
    19 July 2014
    Author:
    @gcschmit

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location findMonster()
      Returns a Location object containing the row and column of the detected monster based on analyzing the accumulator (not based on the monsterLocationRow and monsterLocationCol instance variables).
      int getAccumulatedDetection(Location loc)
      Returns the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object.
      int getNumCols()
      Returns the number of columns in the radar grid
      int getNumRows()
      Returns the number of rows in the radar grid
      int getNumScans()
      Returns the number of scans that have been performed since the radar object was constructed
      boolean isDetected(Location loc)
      Returns true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection.
      void randomizeMonsterLocations(int numberOfMonsters)
      Randomizes a number of monster locations.
      void scan()
      Performs a scan of the radar.
      void setMonsterLocation(Location loc)
      Sets the location of the monster
      void setMonsterLocations(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations)
      Sets monster locations.
      void setNoiseFraction(double fraction)
      Sets the probability that a given cell will generate a false detection

      • Radar

        public Radar(int rows,
             int cols)
        Constructor for objects of class Radar
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows in the radar grid
        cols - the number of columns in the radar grid

    • Method Detail

      • findMonster

        public Location findMonster()
        Returns a Location object containing the row and column of the detected monster based on analyzing the accumulator (not based on the monsterLocationRow and monsterLocationCol instance variables).
        Returns:
        the location of the detected monster

      • getAccumulatedDetection

        public int getAccumulatedDetection(Location loc)
        Returns the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the location to query for accumulated detections
        col - the column of the location to query for accumulated detections
        Returns:
        the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object

      • getNumCols

        public int getNumCols()
        Returns the number of columns in the radar grid
        Returns:
        the number of columns in the radar grid

      • getNumRows

        public int getNumRows()
        Returns the number of rows in the radar grid
        Returns:
        the number of rows in the radar grid

      • getNumScans

        public int getNumScans()
        Returns the number of scans that have been performed since the radar object was constructed
        Returns:
        the number of scans that have been performed since the radar object was constructed

      • isDetected

        public boolean isDetected(Location loc)
        Returns true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the location to query for detection
        col - the column of the location to query for detection
        Returns:
        true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection

      • randomizeMonsterLocations

        public void randomizeMonsterLocations(int numberOfMonsters)
        Randomizes a number of monster locations. Used when user chooses not to manually input monster locations.
        Parameters:
        numberOfMonsters - the number of monster locations to be generated

      • scan

        public void scan()
        Performs a scan of the radar. Noise is injected into the grid and the accumulator is updated.

      • setMonsterLocation

        public void setMonsterLocation(Location loc)
        Sets the location of the monster
        Parameters:
        row - the row in which the monster is located
        col - the column in which the monster is located

      • setMonsterLocations

        public void setMonsterLocations(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations)
        Sets monster locations. Used when user choose to manually input monster locations. Reads in data from an array list in RadarViewer
        Parameters:
        locations - a list of locations to be set

      • setNoiseFraction

        public void setNoiseFraction(double fraction)
        Sets the probability that a given cell will generate a false detection
        Parameters:
        fraction - the probability that a given cell will generate a flase detection expressed as a fraction (must be >= 0 and < 1)
